alert.note: Alert for Adair; Clinton; Cumberland; Metcalfe; Monroe; Russell (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CLINTON...NORTHEASTERN MONROE... SOUTHWESTERN RUSSELL...CUMBERLAND...SOUTHWESTERN ADAIR AND SOUTHEASTERN METCALFE COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Burkesville, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Albany, Jamestown, Burkesville, Leslie, Desda, Cartwright, Snow, Cundiff, Curtis and Savage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Clinton; Cumberland; Metcalfe; Monroe; Russell
